actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Thorn Dart

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Grass Blade

special_abilities.desc: The alliumite has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.
special_abilities.name: Plant Camouflage

special_abilities.desc: Each creature other than an alliumite within 5 feet of the alliumite when it takes damage must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the Tearful Stench of all alliumites for 1 minute.
special_abilities.name: Tearful Stench
